Name: Brave Dungeon - The Meaning of Justice -
About the game: A sequel that inherits the basic system of the previous Brave Dungeon from Dark Witch Series. You can play in different stories and different systems with the scenarios of the three protagonists. -Al: Go through the vast forest of wonder and look for the exit of the forest. We will proceed with the innumerable 'IvyDoors' that block the way by utilizing the limited number of 'GrassKeys'. You can proceed with your exploration more advantageously by getting the pieces of Shega scattered in the forest and creating 'Seama Items'. -Klinsy: The purpose is to get the 'Unsealed Books' hidden in the three library stacks. There is a 'Sealing Trap' in the library that tests the wisdom of intruders. -Papelne: Papelne brought to an empty plain. She starts building her city from scratch. She is free to build the city. Let her create a more attractive city and attract more visitors.
